articles.description: Rory McIlroy describes his performance at the US Open as "pretty average" as he shot a 74 on Saturday to fall back to 10 over.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Rory McIlroy 'keen to see his week end' after 'frustrating' Oakmont tournament

articles.description: Chelsea fans will get their first chance to watch their new wonderkid signing at the Fifa Club World Cup... but not for their team.
articles.title: Estevao Willian: Chelsea to get first sight of new wonderkid... for Palmeiras

articles.description: Holders Mexico begin their defence of the Gold Cup with a 3-2 win over the Dominican Republic.
articles.title: Gold Cup: Holders Mexico began defence with 3-2 win over Dominican Republic

articles.description: Max Verstappen says Formula 1 is "annoying" and that questions about him racing under the threat of a race ban were "childish".
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen says questions about potential race ban 'childish' and 'annoying'

articles.description: The Club World Cup gets under way in the US as Inter Miami play out a goalless draw against Al Ahly.
articles.title: Club World Cup: Lionel Messi and heavy security open tournament

articles.description: Finn Russell says winning a first Gallagher Premiership title is "special" and "has not sunk in" as the fly-half guides Bath to victory against Leicester Tigers.
articles.title: Finn Russell: Bath fly-half explains pass to Max Ojomoh

articles.description: United States men's coach Mauricio Pochettino tells his players they cannot pick and choose which games they will be available for.
articles.title: Gold Cup: USA coach Mauricio Pochettino tells players they cannot pick and choose when they play

articles.description: Richardson Hitchins calls out Devin Haney after claiming a dominant win over George Kambosos Jr to retain his IBF light-welterweight title.
articles.title: Richardson Hitchins calls out Devin Haney after beating George Kambosos Jr

articles.description: Tyrrell Hatton says there is "a lot to play for" besides contending for a maiden major title when he begins his final round at the US Open on Sunday.
articles.title: US Open 2025: Tyrrell Hatton and Robert MacIntyre in contention for maiden major

articles.description: South Africa's players show their mettle to ignore sledges from Australia's players as they go from chokers to World Test champions at Lord's.
articles.title: South Africa ignore Australia's 'choke' sledges at Lord's to win ICC World Test Championship final
